definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: The tropospheric atmosphere refractivity of different laser wave length is expatiated.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了对流层不同波长激光的大气折射率。

sentences.english: Heating the oil produces changes in the index of refraction of the oil making the cell boundaries visible.
sentences.chinese: 取暖油产生变化，在折射率的油，使细胞界限明显。

sentences.english: These include dynamically induced irreversibility and the strong-field index enhancement.
sentences.chinese: 主要考虑强场折射率增强和动态不可逆性。

sentences.english: The thickness of super-thin metallic film was deter-mined by changing the index of matching liquid.
sentences.chinese: 通过改变匹配液的折射率确定了超薄金属膜的厚度。

sentences.english: A method of measuring the thickness and refractive index of thin transparency is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了测量薄透明体厚度及折射率的一种方法。

sentences.english: Starting from the index ellipsoid, the elasto-optical coefficient of crystal is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 运用折射率椭球分析晶体的弹光效应。

sentences.english: The simple algorithm of electromagnetic refraction error due to atmosphere refractivity dry component is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了大气折射率干项引起电波折射误差的简便算法。

sentences.english: When the negative refractive index materials is dispersive, the height of wide-band becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 当负折射率材料具有色散时，宽通带的高度降低。

sentences.english: Nonlinear refraction index change is proportional to square of mean pump power.
sentences.chinese: 非线性折射率与泵浦平均功率的平方成正比。

sentences.english: Low viscosity, fast curing, low odor, high refractive index and euphotic index.
sentences.chinese: 低粘度，固化快，低气味，高折射率和透光率。

sentences.english: The bistability results from the refractive index change due to light injection.
sentences.chinese: 双稳态特性是由入射光的折射率改变所致。

sentences.english: A new method was developed for measuring the refractive index based on total reflection.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种用于全反射法折射率测量的光学系统。

sentences.english: The refractive-index distribution in glass was determined by shearing-interference method.
sentences.chinese: 用干涉剪像法测定了玻璃表面的折射率分布。

sentences.english: Refractive index at different height in the region above a flame was tomographed.
sentences.chinese: 用双曝光散斑法层析了火焰上不同截面的折射率分布。

sentences.english: The index of refraction for the extraordinary ray is therefore a function of direction.
sentences.chinese: 折射光线的折射率因此在各个方向不同。

sentences.english: In this paper the measurement method for the pressure coefficient of optical glass refraction index is offered.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了光学玻璃折射率压力系数的测量方法。
